channel.title: Need help with server ! (im a noob)
channel.description: I tried using many clients and sources i always get confused, like how to get it online and how to make a webclient/client, how to get my friends to have a client how to make cache all those kinds of things please somebody help me

I tried using many clients and sources i always get confused, like how to get it online and how to make a webclient/client, how to get my friends to have a client how to make cache all those kinds of things please somebody help me

you need to portfoward and setup no-ip
